snippet: Readers react to the vice president’s support for gay marriage.
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: You report that White House aides are attempting to create distance between official policy and Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr.'s claim to being ''absolutely comfortable'' with same-sex marriages (''A Scramble as Biden Backs Same-Sex Marriage,'' front page, May 7). If President Obama will not come out in support of equal marriage rights for the gay community now, then when will he?
